scripts.setup:env: npm install && cd servers/fastapi && poetry install && cd ../../servers/nextjs && npm install
scripts.build:nextjs: rm -rf resources/nextjs && cp -r servers/nextjs resources/nextjs && cd resources/nextjs && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
scripts.build:fastapi: rm -rf resources/fastapi && cd servers/fastapi && .venv/bin/pyinstaller --name fastapi --distpath ../../resources server.py
